item.description:
Happy Hour Time For Singles... With THE IRA...!!
New Low Price... New Venue 'By the Water'... Only $8.00...!!
~~


Vito’s By The Water

This Thursday ~ May 14th ~ 5:00 PM to ???

1936 Blue Hill Ave. Ext. ~ Windsor, CT 06095 ~ 860-285-8660

(It is absolutely worth the drive... And easy to get to... Directions are below)

~~

The party continues... New beautiful venue on the water... Such a relaxing view... Come and unwind...

Eat, drink and be merry... Plus... Meet so many new men and women...

~~

Details about the food... Delicious hot and cold fantastic food... plus Vito's famous world class

pizza will be served from 5:00 to 7:00 PM... Cost per person is $8.00...




Details about the bar... Cash bar... Happy Hour bar prices from 5:00 to 7:00 PM... (Individual Bar Tabs)...

Martinis $5.00... Beer and Wine $3.00... Mixed Drinks $5.00... (Prices are for House Specials)...

~~

Please RSVP no later than Thursday, May 14th , at 9:00 AM,

so the restaurant can determine how much delicious food to prepare.

~~

Please Contact: Ira Wettenstein ~ 860-604-5792 ~ mistrchrming@aol.com


~~

Updated News... Happy Hours organized by The IRA have been a tremendous success...

All that attend enjoy themselves with food, beverages, and most importantly, MINGLING AT IT’S VERY BEST...

Name tags, fun mingling activities, and personal introduction to each person that attends, assures even

the most quiet/shy person of meeting everyone there!!!!


~~



And more news...We now have a Exclusive Area... Depending on the number of singles,

a “Special Area” will be just for us... Weather permitting, it may be on the Patio...

Don’t miss out on the fun... Ane The Entertainment of THE IRA...

Let’s Break the Ice... A New Tradition... The Meet and Greet Single Line... A 30 Second Introduction...

Starts at 6:00PM... Don’t miss out on this wonderful way to meet people...!!

~~

See all the Singles having fun at: http://www.meetup.com...

~~

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Happy Hour with The Ira. The Party Continues . New Venue. New Lower Price!!
